name: frogz (finlay :))
description:
Frogz is a very short adventure, where you are a frog and have to find a jar of sacred water from the sacred pond to take with you to the moon.

It is a 2d platformer that has no platforming or enemies, made for the 2020 Game Off game jam (i made it in GDevelop). It is my first game and i hope you have fun :)
